item.title: about
item.description: Hello, I am Sarang Baheti. I am a Mechanical Engineer and CAD Developer by profession. C++ is my language of choice, and I am equally procficient in C and C#. I have been developing large-scale C++ software for ~15 years. I have worked on almost all aspects of CAD system- rendering, selection, performance, part load/save, interop with third-party data and standards, … Currenly I am working at Siemens PLM Software Inc developing NX.
